questions.title: Attention Mechanism in Transformers
questions.prompt: Explain the attention mechanism in transformers and how it differs from RNN/LSTM architectures.
followups: What is self-attention and how is it computed?
Why does attention help with long-range dependencies?

questions.title: GAN Architecture
questions.prompt: Explain how Generative Adversarial Networks work and the training dynamics between generator and discriminator.
followups: What are common failure modes in GAN training?
How do techniques like WGAN or StyleGAN improve upon basic GANs?

questions.title: Causal Inference Methods
questions.prompt: Explain methods for causal inference beyond correlation (propensity score matching, instrumental variables, difference-in-differences).
followups: What are the assumptions behind propensity score matching?
How do you validate causal inference results?

questions.title: Bayesian Neural Networks
questions.prompt: Explain how Bayesian neural networks differ from traditional neural networks and their advantages.
followups: How does variational inference work in Bayesian neural networks?
What are the computational challenges with Bayesian approaches?

questions.title: Reinforcement Learning Algorithms
questions.prompt: Compare Q-learning, policy gradients, and actor-critic methods in reinforcement learning.
followups: What is the exploration-exploitation tradeoff?
How does experience replay work in deep Q-networks?

questions.title: Graph Neural Networks
questions.prompt: Explain how graph neural networks operate and their applications.
followups: How do message passing algorithms work in GNNs?
What are some challenges with scaling GNNs to large graphs?

questions.title: Multi-Armed Bandit Problems
questions.prompt: Explain the multi-armed bandit problem and compare different solution strategies.
followups: How do contextual bandits extend the basic bandit problem?
When would you use bandits instead of A/B testing?

questions.title: Federated Learning
questions.prompt: Explain the federated learning paradigm and its challenges.
followups: How does federated averaging work?
What are the privacy guarantees in federated learning?

questions.title: Time Series Forecasting Models
questions.prompt: Compare traditional time series models (ARIMA, SARIMA) with deep learning approaches (LSTM, Transformers).
followups: How do you handle multivariate time series forecasting?
What are the challenges with long-horizon forecasting?

questions.title: Optimization for Deep Learning
questions.prompt: Explain advanced optimization techniques for deep learning (Adam, RMSprop, learning rate schedules).
followups: Why is adaptive learning rate important?
How do learning rate warmup and decay strategies work?

questions.title: Meta-Learning
questions.prompt: Explain the concept of meta-learning and different approaches (MAML, metric-based).
followups: How does meta-learning differ from traditional transfer learning?
What are the challenges in evaluating meta-learning algorithms?

questions.title: AutoML Systems
questions.prompt: Explain how automated machine learning systems work and their components.
followups: What are the limitations of current AutoML systems?
How do neural architecture search algorithms work?

questions.title: Explainable AI Techniques
questions.prompt: Compare different model interpretation techniques (LIME, SHAP, integrated gradients).
followups: What are the theoretical foundations of SHAP values?
How do you evaluate the quality of explanations?

questions.title: Recommender System Algorithms
questions.prompt: Explain collaborative filtering, content-based filtering, and hybrid approaches in recommender systems.
followups: How does matrix factorization work?
What are the challenges with cold start problems?

questions.title: Model Deployment Challenges
questions.prompt: Discuss challenges in deploying machine learning models to production.
followups: How do you handle model drift in production?
What are the considerations for real-time vs batch inference?
